subject: Re: Order #SSN4874 confirmed
description_text:
Hi,

In France there is no tax for orders under 150 euros, why did you charge
24,38e of taxes?

(do not take my other email into account)

Thanks,
David

conversations.body_text:
Hi,

Once connected i am not seeing any ticket

Le lun. 15 déc. 2025 à 13:24, service@simsonn.com

Hi,

Still not getting access to the ticket, could you please update me?

Thanks

Le lun. 15 déc. 2025 à 13:32, Carreira David <davdi1982@gmail.com> a écrit :

> Hi,
>
> Once connected i am not seeing any ticket
>
> Le lun. 15 déc. 2025 à 13:24, service@simsonn.com
ID 为 8293 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8293  
      主题: Tax on order  
      描述:  Hi,  
   
 I have made the order #SSN4874 and there is tax but, in France there is no tax under 150€. 
   
 Why this taxe? 
   
 Thanks, 
 David
Hi Carreira David,    The EU will adopt a unified approach to tax collection through the IOSS system.

Hi, understand. In France all price are taxe included this is why i do not
understand. Thanks.

Do you know when it will be sent?

Thanks

Le mer. 24 déc. 2025 à 10:02, service@simsonn.com
Hi Carreira David,    Thank you for your understanding. The new shifter orders will be dispatched throughout this week.  Merry Christmas!

Hello,

The status of my order is still the same and shows as not dispatched. I
would appreciate some visibility and a confirmed shipping date.

Thank you.


Le mer. 24 déc. 2025 à 11:04, service@simsonn.com
